Reviews.Title: “budget accomodation”
Reviews.Author: steven l
Reviews.Content: staying whilst doing contractor pleasant helpfull clean presentable bathroom suite fitted recently 17 twin 65 pounds night 3 weeks banks shops local nice little park selection pubs bit pricey basically ritz pay prices basic accomodation thats clean fine

Reviews.Title: “Never Again”

Reviews.Content: oh god worst hotel experience weve hotel located busy road parking wife nearby residential streets parking spacethe walls decor dated desperate didnt chance visit floors floor 1st floor engulfed cigarrette smell supposed nonsmoking hotel smell cigarrettes intense whenever returned hotel door cig smell hits sleep ok sheets smelt cigs unbearable shower disgrace revolting breakfast real breakfast bunch cheap fruits bread short hotel againnot sleep yuk

Reviews.Title: “Far better than expected after reading reviews on here!”
Reviews.Author: psychpolly
Reviews.Content: prior trip read reviews site genuinely apprehensive arrival discover couple stayed 4 nights choosing hotel central london cheap included breakfast ensuite tiny adequate werent planning spending bathroom towels bed linen undeniably clean hotel shabby attention safe clean main especially reading negative reviews tube station walk buses regular breakfast toast cereal fruit hardly expected english budget hotel customer service lacking werent luxury treatment keys left reception isnt ideal reviewers unfortunate lucky am believer people write review theyve bad experience believe deserved balanced review basic budget hotel centre london avoid youre expecting luxury probably fine safe clean base plus personally am fan brushing teeth whilst sat toilet

Reviews.Title: “In 2011 do hotels like this really exist!”
Reviews.Author: NorthernMonkey47
Reviews.Content: hotel unclean bed sheets unclean changed pretended theyd changed sticky furniture fire doors upper traffic noise night front buildingi cheap unacceptable levels hygiene noise sleep difficult

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely bloody awful (and that's being kind)”
Reviews.Author: elliott74
Reviews.Content: bigger broom cupboard bathroom absolutely filthy dare shower hotel complimentary stripe snot bathroom door sheets appeared clean bed pillows hard hot noisy night cancelled arrived couldnt afford lose money days arrived pay hotel recommend hotel disliked

Reviews.Content: carpets corridor looked bad care home floor carpet nasty wooden flooring scrapped cheap portable telly hand shop beds nearly floor low shelf type beds phone fag burns stale odour smoked breakfast crap skipped rest staythis name hotel bbs standards idea leave key advise leaving value wouldnt safe spent sleeping time stayed late spend time hotel nice dont mind bit getting impression fear possibility bed bugs luckily blessing

Reviews.Title: “Pretty poor but you get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: zoobus
Reviews.Content: chose hotel relatively close brixton academy 30 minute walk noisy street tiny smelled paint ancient cheap £60 night probably cheap london hotel breakfast toast cereal bed comfortable sheets clean wouldnt recommend except resort
